languages.text: "Мясо. Господин велел пропустить тебя". {n}Стоит вам приблизиться, как в туше монстра активируются несколько аугментов. С шипением в кровь впрыскиваются какие-то вещества, заставляющие вены вспыхнуть, а мышцы вспухнуть в судороге.{/n}

"Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мясо. Господин велел пропустить тебя". {n}Стоит вам приблизиться, как в туше монстра активируются несколько аугментов. С шипением в кровь впрыскиваются какие-то вещества, заставляющие вены вспыхнуть, а мышцы вспухнуть в судороге.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Meat. The master ordered to let you through." {n}When you approach, a few augmentations spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling the blood with substance that causes its veins to bulge and the muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「マスターの命令だ。お前を通してやる」{n}あなたが近づくと、怪物の体内でいくつかのオーグメティックが動き出す。注射器がシューという音を発し、血管を膨張させ、筋肉を痙攣させる化合物で血液を満たした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「マスターの命令だ。お前を通してやる」{n}あなたが近づくと、怪物の体内でいくつかのオーグメティックが動き出す。注射器がシューという音を発し、血管を膨張させ、筋肉を痙攣させる化合物で血液を満たした。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “活畜，主人吩咐你过去。”{n}当你靠近这只怪物的时候，他体内的植入物活跃起来。他身上的注射器发出了嘶嘶声，血液中充满了化学物质。他的静脉膨胀起来，肌肉猛地隆起，痉挛般地抽搐着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “活畜，主人吩咐你过去。”{n}当你靠近这只怪物的时候，他体内的植入物活跃起来。他身上的注射器发出了嘶嘶声，血液中充满了化学武器。他的静脉膨胀起来，肌肉猛地隆起，痉挛般地抽搐着。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «Carne. El amo ordenó que te dejara pasar». {n}Cuando te acercas, unos auméticos cobran vida en el interior del enorme monstruo. Un inyector sisea, introduciendo en la sangre unos compuestos que inflaman sus venas y causan que sus músculos se hinchen y se retuerzan espasmódicamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Carne. El amo ordenó que te dejara pasar». {n}Cuando te acercas, unos auméticos cobran vida en el interior del enorme monstruo. Un inyector sisea, introduciendo en la sangre una sustancia que inflama sus venas y causa que sus músculos se hinchen y se retuerzan espasmódicamente.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Fleisch. Der Meister hat befohlen, dass Ihr durchgelassen werdet." {n}Als du dich näherst, erwachen einige Augmentationen in der gewaltigen Masse des Monsters zum Leben. Ein Injektor zischt und füllt sein Blut mit Substanzen, durch die seine Adern anschwellen und seine Muskeln ausbeulen und krampfartig zucken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fleisch. Der Meister hat befohlen, dass Ihr durchgelassen werdet." {n}Als du dich näherst, erwachen einige Augmentationen in der gewaltigen Masse des Monsters zum Leben. Ein Injektor zischt und füllt das Blut mit einer Substanz, durch die seine Adern anschwellen und seine Muskeln ausbeulen und krampfartig zucken.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Viande. Le maître a ordonné de vous laisser passer. » {n}Au moment où vous approchez, plusieurs augmétiques du monstre s'activent ; un injecteur siffle, inoculant dans son sang une substance qui fait gonfler ses veines et convulser ses muscles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Viande. Le maître a ordonné de vous laisser passer. » {n}Au moment où vous approchez, plusieurs augmétiques du monstre s'activent ; ses injecteurs sifflent, inoculant dans son sang une substance qui fait gonfler et convulser ses veines et ses muscles.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Et. Efendim, geçmene müsaade etmemi emretti." {n}Yaklaşmanla birlikte canavarın hantal gövdesindeki birkaç ogmetik, harekete geçiyor. Tıslayan bir şırınga, kanına damarlarını şişiren ve kaslarını kabartarak gelişigüzel seğirten bileşenler aşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Meat. The master ordered that you be let through." {n}When you approach, a few augmetics spring to life inside the monster's bulk. An injector hisses, filling its blood with compounds that cause its veins to bulge and its muscles to swell and twitch spasmodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Et. Efendim, senin geçmene izin vermemi emretti." {n}Yaklaşmanla birlikte canavarın hantal gövdesindeki birkaç ogmetik harekete geçiyor. Bir şırınga tıslayarak kanına damarlarını şişiren ve kaslarını kabartarak gelişigüzel seğirten bileşenler dolduruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant
